general.gigTitle: design and develop responsive wordpress website

sellerCard.description: I'm Your trusted friend who can do magic with WordPress. Hi, I'm Mukur, a professional web developer. I always try to understand my client's requirements & what they want for their website. My mission is to satisfy my clients & help them from beginning to end the project & also give support to them for every problem. Feel free to contact me so that we can discuss the project in details.

description.content:
Are you looking for a WordPress Website developer for creating, launching & managing your business or blog?


Well then, This gig is a blank canvas for your ideas, and I'm the best brush who can do magic with WordPress. I love to visualize ideas and make them come alive on a website. I'll create high-end, pixel perfect websites at record speeds. Any theme, any page, any design within your time & budget.


I'll perform the following actions:

  • Fast Loading Responsive Web Design That Looks Good On All Devices With Stunning Design & Functionalities
  • Before starting to work UI/UX Design on Adobe XD.
  • Premium Theme, Plugin install & customization
  • Live Chat Support
  • REST API authentication with Application Passwords
  • Social Media Integrations, Review & Ratings
  • SEO, Speed Optimization, Backup & Security
  • Google AdSense, Google Analytics, Mailchimp Integration
  • Contact Forms, Google Maps, Newsletter Subscription


Bonus Features:

  • I'll provide you a video tutorial that shows you how to manage your website.
  • I'll offer a complete refund in case of dissatisfaction.
  • 6 Month Free Premium Support 24/7.


Contact me for more information and FREE consultation!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What details do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need your domain & hosting login info with website content that includes logo, images, and title.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide multiple revisions. Your 100% satisfaction is my first priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I dont know how to use WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Its okay, Well be happy to give you an instruction without any extra payment.

packageList.title: Gold
packageList.description: One Page Website or Landing Page Including Slider, Form, Social Share, Newsletter

packageList.title: Platinum
packageList.description: AdSense Approved  Professional Responsive WordPress Website With Premium Theme, Plugins

packageList.title: Diamond
packageList.description: Super Fast Elegant Eye Catching Custom Design Website With All The Features You Need
